H0.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. Phytoplankton

H1.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. Seagrasses

H2.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. River runoff

H3.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. detritus

A4.text: A primary source of food for many organisms on estuaries, including bacteria, is detritus from the settlement of the sediment.

A5.text: Water draining from upland areas carries sediments, nutrients, and pollutants into estuaries.

A6.text: Worms discard wastes that create worm castings containing undigested materials where bacteria and other decomposers gain access to the nutrients.

A7.text: In 1898 there is a reference to the nitrogen cycle in relation to nitrogen fixing microorganisms.
